name: Ruin Ascension (Demo)
description:
Lodge your weapon into enemies and toss their bodies to create potent, satisfying combos! Featuring an endless mode to test how far your skills will take you, and a versus mode to show your friends who's boss!

- Notes from the developer -

This is the product of devtober 2018! I made this over the course of a month, starting October 1st and ending on Halloween.

Originally, I had the idea to make a game with multiple levels, boss fights, etc, but I quickly realized that was too big of a scope. As such, I shrunk down my goals for devtober to function as a vertical slice of a full game that I plan to finish in the future. This demo contains an endless mode and a versus mode to show off the core mechanics and local multiplayer.

No plans on when the full game will be released yet. Follow my twitter (https://twitter.com/illdie314) to keep up with my projects!
